meanings.definition: A person or group of people included on a list.
meanings.sent1: The listees for the event were all excited to participate.
meanings.sent2: The teacher called out the names of the listees for the school trip.
meanings.sent3: The listees for the party brought delicious snacks to share.
meanings.sent4: The listees in the competition stood out with their unique talents.
meanings.sent5: The listees in the club formed a strong bond over time.

meanings.definition: To include someone or something on a list.
meanings.sent1: Please listees all the items needed for the project.
meanings.sent2: She carefully listees the ingredients for the recipe.
meanings.sent3: He decided to listees his favorite movies for the movie night.
meanings.sent4: The team captain listees the players for the upcoming match.
meanings.sent5: Remember to listees all the important tasks for the day.
